EmailTemplate.name: 2019.07.19 - BS - Acco Review #2.Acco Review Email #2
EmailTemplate.subject: Your FREE Gift Awaits
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View Online <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=BSACCOREVIEW19&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Spend $100 or more and get a FREE* Quartet Glass Desktop Dry-Erase Pad to use and review.
Use code 2019FREE at checkout. <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=BSACCOREVIEW19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/product/29987-0_Quartet_Glass_Desktop_Dry-Erase_Pad_-_18_x_6.aspx?cmp=EBBSACCOREVIEW19&utm_source={{my.UTM%20Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> As a Business Select member, we’re going to sweeten the deal. Once you submit a review of the product, you’ll also get a $20 coupon† for even more savings! <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=BSACCOREVIEW19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Shop Now <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/default.aspx?cmp=BSACCOREVIEW19&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Customer Service <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/contact-us.aspx?cmp=EBCUSTOMERCARE2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Terms & Conditions <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/terms-and-conditions.aspx?cmp=EBTERMS2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> | Privacy Policy <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/en/sites/core/privacy-policy.aspx?cmp=EBPRIVACY2018EN&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> Grand & Toy | 200 Aviva Park Drive, Vaughan, ON L4L9C7 | 1-866-391-8111
*Offer valid at www.grandandtoy.com only until August 15, 2019. Offer valid while supplies last. Minimum purchase of $100 is required after other discounts and before tax. Enter promo code 2019FREE at checkout to receive your free Quartet Glass Desktop Dry-Erase Pad (SKU 29987-0). Retail Value: $51.03. Limit one redemption per account. One time use only. Offer not valid on special furniture orders. Void if copied, sold, purchased, transferred, taxed or where prohibited. Cannot be combined with any other coupon, associate discount, or any other offers. Offer not valid on prior purchases or for credit card payments. No cash or credit back. Open to Canadian residents only. Cash value .001¢. Offer expires August 15, 2019. Must be redeemed within the validity period. Offers are subject to change without notice.
†Upon the redemption of the Quartet Glass Desktop Dry-Erase Pad (SKU 29987-0), a follow up email will be deployed asking to complete a short survey. After completion of the survey the $20 promo code will be deployed via email within 30 days.
